alert.note: Alert for Reno (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 17 at 8:32PM CDT until September 17 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL RENO COUNTY... At 831 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Abbyville, or 14 miles east of Zenith, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Hutchinson, South Hutchinson, Buhler, Haven, Nickerson, Arlington, Partridge, Abbyville, Yoder, Willowbrook and Hutchinson Airport. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
